import type { Assign } from '@ark-ui/vue'
import { Carousel } from '@ark-ui/vue/carousel'
import { carousel } from 'styled-system/recipes'
import type { HTMLStyledProps } from 'styled-system/types'
import type { Component } from 'vue'
import { createStyleContext } from '~/lib/create-style-context'

const { withProvider, withContext } = createStyleContext(carousel)

export type RootProviderProps = Component<typeof RootProvider>
export const RootProvider = withProvider<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Carousel.RootProviderBaseProps>
>(Carousel.RootProvider, 'root')

export type RootProps = Component<typeof Root>
export const Root = withProvider<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Carousel.RootBaseProps>>(
  Carousel.Root,
  'root',
)

export type ControlProps = Component<typeof Control>
export const Control = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Carousel.ControlBaseProps>>(
  Carousel.Control,
  'control',
)

export type IndicatorGroupProps = Component<typeof IndicatorGroup>
export const IndicatorGroup = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Carousel.IndicatorGroupBaseProps>
>(Carousel.IndicatorGroup, 'indicatorGroup')

export type IndicatorProps = Component<typeof Indicator>
export const Indicator = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'button'>, Carousel.IndicatorBaseProps>
>(Carousel.Indicator, 'indicator')

export type ItemGroupProps = Component<typeof ItemGroup>
export const ItemGroup = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Carousel.ItemGroupBaseProps>>(
  Carousel.ItemGroup,
  'itemGroup',
)

export type ItemProps = Component<typeof Item>
export const Item = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Carousel.ItemBaseProps>>(
  Carousel.Item,
  'item',
)

export type NextTriggerProps = Component<typeof NextTrigger>
export const NextTrigger = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'button'>, Carousel.NextTriggerBaseProps>
>(Carousel.NextTrigger, 'nextTrigger')

export type PrevTriggerProps = Component<typeof PrevTrigger>
export const PrevTrigger = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'button'>, Carousel.PrevTriggerBaseProps>
>(Carousel.PrevTrigger, 'prevTrigger')

export type ViewportProps = Component<typeof Viewport>
export const Viewport = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Carousel.ViewportBaseProps>>(
  Carousel.Viewport,
  'viewport',
)

export {
  CarouselContext as Context,
  type CarouselContextProps as ContextProps,
} from '@ark-ui/vue/carousel'
